name: BGSjam7 - "With Our Powers Combined"
description:
Check out this collection of games made during BGSjam7, the seventh official game jam of WNY-based non-profit Buffalo Game Space! In 48 hours, creators worked around the clock to make games based on the theme "With Our Powers Combined" and made shmups, puzzle games, co-op multiplayer games and more!

NOTE: The games in this pack are provided as-is. There may be bugs or odd hardware requirements.
